General.Name: Reinet Investments S.C.A
General.Description: Reinet Investments S.C.A. operates as a securitization vehicle in Luxembourg. The company, through its subsidiary, Reinet Fund S.C.A., F.I.S., invests in assets. Reinet Investments Manager S.A. operates as a general partner of Reinet Investments S.C.A. The company was formerly known as Richemont S.A. and changed its name to Reinet Investments S.C.A. in October 2008. Reinet Investments S.C.A. was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Luxembourg City, Luxembourg.
General.Address: 35, Boulevard Prince Henri, Luxembourg City, Luxembourg, 1724
